articles.title: Government issues ‘high’ security risk warning for Android, Google Chrome and Firefox users - The Times of India
articles.description: TECH NEWS News: CERT-In warns of Android OS vulnerabilities. Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology oversees. Google Chrome versions prior to 123.0.6312.105

articles.title: Amazon: Tech giant cuts hundreds of jobs in cloud computing unit - BBC.com
articles.description: Amazon Web Services represents 14% of the firm's overall revenue but the firm is shifting strategies.
